channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Ajax Chat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Ajax Chat

item.title: CVE-2024-2470|2024-06-04T06:00:02.220Z -- Unknown -- Simple Ajax Chat
item.description: The Simple Ajax Chat WordPress plugin before 20240412 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-1983|2024-03-20T05:00:02.910Z -- Unknown -- Simple Ajax Chat
item.description: The Simple Ajax Chat WordPress plugin before 20240223 does not prevent visitors from using malicious Names when using the chat, which will be reflected unsanitized to other users.
